form.dropdown_images:
Click to select pictures,
or drag them here

errors.empty_fields: Fill in at least one of the fields: text, tags, link. Or upload pictures
errors.empty_accounts: Specify where to publish the post

tg_form.title: Connect Telegram
tg_form.set_bot_name: Come up with a name for the bot, such as Delicatessen.
tg_form.set_bot_username: Now give the bot a username, such as delicatessen_bot.
tg_form.copy_generated_token: @BotFather will give you a token, copy it into the box above
tg_form.connect_bot_to_chanel: Connecting the bot to the channel
tg_form.connect_bot_to_chanel_desc: Add a bot as an administrator to your channel. Leave only the "Publish messages" permission.
tg_form.connect_bot_to_group: Connecting the bot to a group
tg_form.connect_bot_to_group_desc: Add the bot as a member to the group.
tg_form.access_to_group_and_channel: Access to a channel or group
tg_form.access_to_group_and_channel_desc: Note that the channel or group must be public to be able to post.
tg_form.failed_to_connect: Failed to connect. Check that the data entered is correct

insta_form.title: Connect Instagram
insta_form.enter_your_login_password: Enter your Instagram username and password
insta_form.enter_sended_code: Enter the code sent to your phone or email

hint.prolong: If you pay the current fare, it will be extended
hint.switch_tariff: If you choose the new tariff, the remaining days of the previous tariff will be recalculated and transferred to the new tariff

bitrix.title: Module for 1C-Bitrix
bitrix.desc: Allows you to publish posts to popular social networks directly from infoblocks

wordpress.title: Plugin for Wordpress
wordpress.desc: Automatically publish posts from your blog or store
